snippet: ZONANA--Nelly, passed away on June 14, 2016 at the age of 94. She was the beloved mother of Joyce Zonana and Victor Zonana and widow of Felix Zonana. Nelly was born in Cairo, Egypt and lived an extraordinary life. She raised two wonderful, accomplished children and made friends everywhere she went. Her family considered her to be the strongest and sweetest person they ever met. A memorial service will be held at a future time. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZONANA--Nelly, passed away on June 14, 2016 at the age of 94. She was the beloved mother of Joyce Zonana and Victor Zonana and widow of Felix Zonana. Nelly was born in Cairo, Egypt and lived an extraordinary life. She raised two wonderful, accomplished children and made friends everywhere she went. Her family considered her to be the strongest and sweetest person they ever met. A memorial service will be held at a future time. 1/3
